content: In CSV format, provide the names, locations, and brief descriptions of four famous landmarks from different continents.

Sure! Here are four famous landmarks from different continents in CSV format:

"Name","Location","Description"

"The Great Wall of China","China","A series of fortifications built along the northern borders of China to protect against invasions."

"Eiffel Tower","France","An iconic iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, built in 1889."

"Statue of Liberty","United States","A gift from France to the United States, symbolizing freedom and democracy, located in New York Harbor."

"Christ the Redeemer","Brazil","A large Art Deco-style statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, considered one of the New Seven Wonders of the World."
